title: (x) DirtyHouse - House Industries {Matt Desmond}
content: I'm trying to find out anything I can on purchasing the typeface DirtyHouse (I think it's from HellCat... but I don't know for sure) Any info would be appreciated. Thanks.

comments.content: Is it possibly the one from [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125655/http:/houseind.com/house.php?kit=HOOD-FO)?

hey, that's the one. Thanks for your help   
-chris
